parental_controls.control: Under the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA), we require parental consent for users under the age of 13.
Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we require parental consent for users under the age of 16.
Under the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA) consent is required for users under 13.
Under Australian law consent is required for users under 15.
Under the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD), we require parental consent for users under the age of 16.
Under the Act on the Protection of Personal Information (APPI) consent is required for users under 18.
